info.author: Grupo Uremix
info.description:
python-mobile

Introduction:

This is a project that aims to be a python module who helps in the development of mobile-based communication software.

At the moment this module can:
 * auto detect the mobile devices connected to the computer.
 * read, send, delete SMS
 * read, save phonebook entries
 * send/receive USSD commands

Creator:

Luis Ariel Vega Soliz (ariel.vega@uremix.org)

Contact:

website: http://uremix.org
wiki: http://wiki.uremix.org/wiki/Python-mobile
repository: https://github.com/arielvega/python-mobile

License:

This project is "software libre", and is licensed under the terms and conditions of the GPL v3 license.

info.summary: Una utilidad para realizar operaciones con teléfonos celulares/modems
